title: Adjust priority scoring to weight sales/opportunity signals by quality and cap their influence

sections.text: Update the priority scoring model so sales/opportunity linkage contributes based on opportunity quality (e.g., stage, ARR magnitude, ICP fit) and is capped to prevent dominating the overall issue score. Add time decay for stale opportunities so old deal asks don’t keep issues artificially elevated. Ensure the sales contribution cannot exceed the contribution from support/customer evidence when evidence is sparse.
